The more “senior” the specialist is, the more opportunities for development he or she has.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At L2 (Specialist), you get a chance to join the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/Tech+Mentoring\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentoring Program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" as a Mentee. Each Mentee is assigned to a Mentor – a more experienced colleague working with him on the same project. Mentors help their Mentees grow. There's always a plan for the Mentee's development, including specific tasks and deadlines for performing them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Starting from Senior level, you can participate in the Mentoring Program as a Mentor and contribute to your colleagues' professional development.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3fd07b1c-7324-4267-8937-05703820eb53/CDP.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":436,\"height\":343}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are numerous opportunities for professional and personal development within EPAM. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/All+CDP+Services\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CDP (Career Development Program)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is your greatest assistant on the way to growth. CDP offers dozens of trainings, programs, workshops, English and German language courses, and a huge library.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn about available trainings and enroll for those that interest you, go to the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/catalog/upcoming\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Once your manager has approved your attendance, go get trained. And don't forget to leave feedback for the trainer afterwards. CC).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Otherwise, there's a chance to
